channel.title: 瑪利歐的測試

item.title: build e2e testing env from zero to 1 using Azure Devops
item.description: Tools Azure DevOps Installing Required Azure DevOps Extensions Terrform CLI Docker Environment We are going build three components within End-to-End testing environment: Pipelines - build robot-framework docker image, execute e2e test cases Infrastructure - All services in end-to-end testing environment, include pipeline, repo, variables, agnet pool Test Runner - The machine installed robot framework to execute test cases as container Pipelines build robot-framework docker image execute end-to-end test case Test Runner Multiple test runner run as container within Azure Container Instances Group Azure Container Registry Docker registry service connections add new service connections by manully (workarround) Tasks used in your pipeline to build images, push images The template used to create your test runner: docker-robot-framework The template used to provision your test runner in Azure container Group: terraform-azurerm-aci-devops-agent Execute sample test cases in pipeline to choose one test runner from Azure agent pool Troubleshoot Build your docker iamge on local machine docker build -t="latest" .

item.title: About
item.description: Experience 6+ years of software engineering experence in Test Automation, Test Tooling and Infrastructure 4+ years of software devoperment in Game devlopement in C++ Experience with continuouse integration with Jenkins, Azure DevOps Experience with writing automation test case with robot framework in python Experience with to configure automated tests to execute reliably and efficiently in CI/CD environments Experience with finding vulnerability in white-box testing (WIP) Experience with building natived applications in golang (WIP) I am going to learn or write Topics in 2021 Introduce to selenium 4 Execute test case in parallel selenium Grid and selenium 4 Doing API testing for microservices by using PACT Doing integrate testing with testcontainers Experience Sharing in Precision Testing with Golang Native cloud application CI/CD tools - Jenkins X
